# tf.contrib.memory_stats.BytesInUse

Generates an op that computes the current memory of a device.

``` python
tf.contrib.memory_stats.BytesInUse()
```



Defined in [`contrib/memory_stats/python/ops/memory_stats_ops.py`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/tree/r1.14/tensorflow/contrib/memory_stats/python/ops/memory_stats_ops.py).
